img_above_text:
![Woods Ember Walkthrough \(87\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/c/c5/Woods_Ember_Walkthrough_%2887%29.png)
Go straight first, then look for the archer on the lower level to the right. Once you've eradicated the archer, follow the path all the way to the right to find three Revenant Charbones guarding a **Luoija Fragrant Vine**.
img_below_text:
Pick up the Fire Bellflower on the left at the bottom of the wooden path before you head toward the Revenants and the vine.
Height of Ember Luojia Fragrant Vine

img_summary: The image depicts a dark, eerie forest path with a character, likely the player's avatar, standing on a wooden bridge. The path ahead is surrounded by barren trees and rocky terrain, leading to an area guarded by enemies. This scene is part of a game walkthrough where the player needs to navigate through the forest, defeat an archer, and confront three Revenant Charbones to obtain a Luoija Fragrant Vine. The image serves to illustrate the environment and the immediate challenge the player faces in this segment of the game.
